tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_pledge_transactions CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_pledge_transactions AS SELECT afpd.pledge_id, afpd.id AS amp_pledge_funding_id, 999999999 AS related_activity_id, 7 AS transaction_type, (select acv.id from amp_category_value acv where acv.category_value = 'Actual' and acv.amp_category_class_id = (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='adjustment_type')) AS adjustment_type, CASE WHEN afpd.datestart IS NULL THEN to_date('02 Jan '::text || afpd.year::text, 'DD Mon YYYY'::text)::timestamp without time zone ELSE afpd.datestart END AS transaction_date, afpd.amount AS transaction_amount, afpd.currency AS currency_id, afpd.pledge_type AS pledge_type, afpd.type_of_assistance AS type_of_assistance, afpd.aid_modality AS aid_modality, CASE WHEN afpd.datestart IS NOT NULL AND afpd.dateend IS NOT NULL THEN (date(afpd.datestart) || ' - '::text) || date(afpd.dateend) ELSE 'Undefined' END AS funding_range, 800000000 + afp.amp_org_grp_id AS donor_id, afp.status AS status_id
FROM amp_funding_pledges_details afpd JOIN amp_funding_pledges afp ON afp.id = afpd.pledge_id
UNION ALL
SELECT vmpt.pledge_id, vmpt.amp_fund_detail_id AS amp_pledge_funding_id, vmpt.amp_activity_id AS related_activity_id, vmpt.transaction_type, vmpt.adjustment_type, vmpt.transaction_date, vmpt.transaction_amount, vmpt.currency_id, 999999999 AS pledge_type, vmpt.terms_of_assistance_id AS type_of_assistance, 999999999 AS aid_modality, 'Undefined' as funding_range, vmpt.donor_id, afp.status AS status_id
FROM v_mondrian_pure_transactions vmpt JOIN amp_funding_pledges afp ON vmpt.pledge_id = afp.id WHERE vmpt.pledge_id IS NOT NULL AND vmpt.draft <> true AND vmpt.deleted <> true AND vmpt.is_last_version > 0;
